mapper.select: SELECT /* edMbrEd.getEdMbrEdLastInfo */ EM.MBR_NO , EM.MBR_NM , EM.GEND_CD , SC01.CD_NM AS GEND_NM , EM.AGE , EME.REQ_ORG , EM.TEL_NO1 , EM.TEL_NO2 , EM.TEL_NO3 , EME.CRE_ID , SC02.CD_NM AS SITE_NM , FN_AGE_CD(EM.AGE,'Y') AS AGE_NM FROM ED_MBR EM LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC01 ON (SC01.GRP_CD = 'C1100' AND EM.GEND_CD = SC01.CD_ID) LEFT JOIN ED_MBR_ED EME ON (EM.MBR_NO = EME.MBR_NO) LEFT JOIN SYS_USR SU ON (EME.CRE_ID = SU.USR_ID) LEFT JOIN SYS_CD SC02 ON (SC02.GRP_CD = 'C3500' AND SU.SITE_CD = SC02.CD_ID) WHERE EM.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo} ORDER BY EME.CRE_DT DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* edMbrEd.getEdMbrEdInfo */ EM.MBR_NO , EM.MBR_NM , EM.GEND_CD , EM.JUMIN_NO1 , EM.AGE , EM.TEL_NO1 , EM.TEL_NO2 , EM.TEL_NO3 , EM.ZIP_CD , EM.ADDR1 , EM.ADDR2 , EM.JOB_CD , EME.R_ZIP_CD , EME.R_ADDR1 , EME.R_ADDR2 , EME.REQ_DT , EME.DOC_NO , EME.CASE_NO , EME.CRIME_TYPE01 , EME.CRIME_TYPE02 , EME.CRIME_TYPE03 , EME.CRIME_TYPE04 , EME.CRIME_TYPE_ETC , EME.DRUG1 , EME.DRUG1_ETC , EME.DRUG2 , EME.DRUG2_ETC , EME.DRUG3 , EME.DRUG3_ETC , EME.DRUG4 , EME.DRUG4_ETC , EME.USE_TERM , EME.REQ_DETAILS01 , EME.REQ_DETAILS02 , EME.REQ_DETAILS03 , EME.REQ_DETAILS04 , EME.REQ_DETAILS_ETC , EME.REQ_ORG , EME.PROS_NO , EME.DETECTIVE , EME.FILE_ID , EME.MBR_ED_ID , FI.ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FI.FILE_ID , FI.FILE_SEQ FROM ED_MBR EM LEFT JOIN ED_MBR_ED EME ON (EM.MBR_NO = EME.MBR_NO) LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO FI ON (EME.FILE_ID = FI.FILE_ID) WHERE EM.MBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
AND EME.MBR_ED_ID = #{mbrEdId}
